
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://iowaprintsolutions.com/sitemap.xml

# Encourage crawling of main content
Allow: /
Allow: /about
Allow: /services
Allow: /resources
Allow: /blog
Allow: /tools
Allow: /contact
Allow: /locations
Allow: /services/*
Allow: /resources/*
Allow: /blog/*
Allow: /locations/*

# Disallow crawling of build files and assets
Disallow: /assets/
Disallow: /*.js$
Disallow: /*.css$
Disallow: /*.map$
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow specific file types that may be useful
Allow: /*.pdf$
Allow: /*.jpg$
Allow: /*.jpeg$
Allow: /*.png$
Allow: /*.gif$
Allow: /*.svg$

# Crawl-delay to be respectful
Crawl-delay: 1

# Specific bot instructions
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

# AI Search Engine Crawlers
User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Cohere-AI
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1

User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 1
